title: S3. Ep3. Talking with Mike Ashcroft, Co-Founder of EstimateOne. We talk start-ups, technology and taking the step from construction, into SaaS

author: Building Environs

sections.heading: S3. Ep3. Talking with Mike Ashcroft, Co-Founder of EstimateOne. We talk start-ups, technology and taking the step from construction, into SaaS

sections.content: In this week's podcast episode, we're joined by +[Mike Ashcroft](https://www.linkedin.com/in/mike-ashcroft/)+. Mike is one of the Co-founders of +[EstimateOne](https://estimateone.com/)+, the web-based tendering platform that many construction professionals in Australia (especially those involved in estimating), will have been using (or at least, aware of), for a number of years.

+[EstimateOne](https://estimateone.com/)+ is an Australian software company, which provides the construction industry with easier access and a more efficient tendering process and engagement between head contractors, and sub-contractors. Now expanding internationally, it is unquestionably the top, web-based estimate and support platform, in Australia.

We talked about how, over a couple of beers, +[EstimateOne](https://estimateone.com/)+ was born, some of the challenges faced as the business grew into the market, how the software was improved and developed to better support the construction tender process – getting the answers to the 'hows' and 'whys' EstimatOne has become the leading tender software in Australia.
Amongst other things, in this podcast we discussed:

items: Identifying the opportunity that's hidden in repetition
Taking the plunge: stepping out of construction & Estimating, into software development
Plans for the future – international growth?

sections.content: If you have an interest in the Melbourne building industry, interested in the stories of the leaders in the industry and how they firstly saw, then took the opportunity; have a listen.

sections.title: S3. Ep3. Talking with Mike Ashcroft, Co-Founder of EstimateOne. We talk start-ups, technology and taking the step from construction, into SaaS
